title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info
author: oeyoews
name: Tiddlywiki Tiddler Info
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/readme","text":"* Show Tiddler Info * note: reoverwrite [[$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle]] tiddler "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/icon","text":" "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/info-config":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/info-config","text":"\define tid() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/config
Change Emoji Icon
created <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="ocreated" placeholder="üëâ" tag="input"/>
modified <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="omodified" placeholder="üìù" tag="input"/>
description <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="odescription" placeholder="‚úÖ" tag="input"/>
tags <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="otags" placeholder="üè∑Ô∏è" tag="input"/>
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/macro/nauthor":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/macro/nauthor","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define nauthor() get[creator]addprefix[https://github.com/]] }}} class="tc-tiddlylink-external" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"> [img width=22 [neotw/gavatar]] {{!!creator}} \end "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/config":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/config","ocreated":"üëâ","omodified":"üìù","odescription":"‚úÖ","otags":"üè∑Ô∏è"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/style":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/style","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":".nauthor img { width: 100%; height: auto; max-width: 14px; max-height: 22px; border-radius: 75%; aspect-ratio: 1 / 1; } "},"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle":{"title":"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate","text":"\define tid() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/config <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> text="hide" tag="div" retain="yes" animate="yes">
<$list filter="[all[current]has[creator]]"> get[creator]addprefix[https://github.com/]] }}} class="tc-tiddlylink-external" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"> [img width=22 [neotw/gavatar]] {{!!creator}}   <$list filter="[all[current]has[created]]"> {{{[get[ocreated]]}}} created  <$view field="created" format="date" template="YYYY/0MM/0DD"/>   <$list filter="[all[current]has[modified]]"> {{{[get[omodified]]}}} modified  <$view field="modified" format="relativedate" />   <$list filter="[all[current]has[description]]"> {{{[get[odescription]]}}} {{!!description}}   
"},"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags":{"title":"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate","text":"
<$list filter="[all[current]tags[]sort[title]]"> {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/config!!otags}} <$list filter="[all[current]tags[]sort[title]]" template="$:/core/ui/TagTemplate" storyview="pop"/>
"}}}
